prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What action should I take regarding Stefan's movie message that I missed?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a compilation of the chart data relevant to the question using horary principles:

1. Query Representatives
 • Querent (“Me”) is indicated by the Ascendant at 7° Virgo (1st House).
 • Stefan is represented by the Ascendant’s 9th house. In this chart the 9th house begins at 27° Aries and contains Uranus (located at 23°17′ Taurus).

2. House Placements
 • 1st House (Self): Starts at 7° Virgo – no additional planets aside from the Ascendant.
 • 6th House (Daily Routines/Work): Starts at 12° Aquarius – contains the Sun (19°29′ Aquarius) and Mercury (18°22′ Aquarius), highlighting communication and routine matters.
 • 7th House (Relationships/Partnerships): Starts at 7° Pisces – contains Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node (in Pisces), emphasizing relational dynamics and subtle karmic influences.
 • 8th House (Hidden/Transformations): Starts at 0° Aries – contains Venus (2°36′ Aries) and Chiron (19°43′ Aries), suggesting issues related to intimacy or shared resources that may be at work behind the scenes.
 • 9th House (Foreign, Messages, Expansion – representing Stefan): Starts at 27° Aries – contains Uranus (23°17′ Taurus), a marker for unexpected or unconventional influences.
 • 10th House (Public Image/Media): Starts at 2° Gemini – contains the Moon (23°56′ Gemini) and Jupiter (11°18′ Gemini), relevant for matters of public communication and exposure.

3. Major Aspects (with low orb values noted as significant)
 • Mercury Square Uranus (orb: 5°): Indicates tension between communication (Mercury in the 6th) and the unconventional, unexpected element (Uranus in the 9th representing Stefan).
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb: 4°): Also highlights disruptive energy affecting the querent’s communication or daily routines as they relate to Stefan.
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 1°): Reinforces the focus on communication matters.
 • Venus Conjunction North Node (orb: 3°) and Venus Sextile MC (orb: 0°): These support the connection between hidden matters and public expression.
 • North Node Sextile MC (orb: 3°) and Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°): Underpin transformative influences affecting the career/public domain as well as karmic timing.
 • Other supportive aspects include Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb: 1°) and Moon Sextile Chiron (orb: 4°), pointing to healing insights related to the situation.

4. Chart Patterns
 • T-Square Pattern: Formed by the MC (2° Gemini), Ascendant (7° Virgo), and IC (2° Sagittarius); this pattern can indicate tension between personal approaches (Ascendant) and public or domestic matters.
 • Cradle Pattern: Involving the MC (2° Gemini), IC (2° Sagittarius), Pluto (2° Aquarius), North Node (29° Pisces), and Venus (2° Aries); this pattern lends insight into influences of transformation, shared resources, and destined connections.

5. Additional Notable Data
 • The Moon is in Gemini on the Midheaven (10th House), indicating an active role of communication and public messages.
 • Elements: There is a dominance of Air among the inner planets, emphasizing the intellectual and communicative nature of the query.
 • Modes: The Mutable quality prevails among the inner planets, suggesting flexibility and adaptability are central to the issue.
 • The chart’s overall structure (Bowl shape, top/right hemisphere strength) reinforces an intellectual approach to resolving the missed movie message.

This list compiles the key planetary positions, aspects, and patterns for further interpretation regarding the action to take on Stefan’s movie message.

This list compiles the key planetary positions, aspects, and patterns for further interpretation regarding the action to take on Stefan’s movie message.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
The chart indicates that your missed movie message comes under the influence of abrupt, unconventional energy. Mercury in Aquarius, tightly joined to the Sun, stresses communication as a key factor, yet its square with Uranus in the 9th house (Stefan’s realm) warns of unpredictable interruptions or changes. This aspect suggests that Stefan’s message may have been delivered in a nonstandard or circuitous manner, and that its content might require clarification.

The fact that your Ascendant is in Virgo calls for a practical, detail-oriented approach. In this light, it is advisable to correct the oversight promptly by reaching out to Stefan directly—preferably through clear, unambiguous methods such as a phone call or a carefully worded message. The T-square pattern involving your MC and IC further reinforces the need to bridge the gap between internal perceptions and public communication.

In short, the reading urges you to take decisive action now. Contact Stefan immediately to address any misunderstandings and to secure the information related to his movie message.
